channel.title: Softlayer_scale_asset on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_scale_asset on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset Service Datatype Description The base asset of a scale group. Assets are fixed, non-volatile units of a scale group. They are pinned to the group and will not be automatically added or removed. Their primary purpose is to provide information for the policies to use to determine when to scale members. Methods deleteObject Delete this group asset. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Scale_Asset record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset Datatype Description Local createDate When this asset was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion. Type: boolean id An asset's internal identifier. Type: integer scaleGroupId The identifier of the group this asset belongs to.

item.title: getScaleGroup
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Asset::getScaleGroup Overview Retrieve the group this asset belongs to.
